text: Enywe abasuubila muleera ebiyimwa nimuli muharam (muhija nohomba umra) tawe. Ne ulia ulera katong’ane omurungo kwe kulaba okhusinza shinga eshayera esho, mutsisolo tsirukungwa shingala balabusia abaleng’aafu babili mwinywe, isolo eyo iyilwa khu kaaba, (asinze eyo mana ikabilwe abatakha). Nohomba arusie omurungo kwo khulisia abamanani, Nohomba afunge, kho apile obubii bwelikhuwa elo. Nyasaye yamala okhuleshela akabura, Halali ulakalushila Nyasaye alamuwa eshinyasio, Ne Nyasaye niye owa amani owuhananga eshinyasio
